QuestData.Title: The Shell of Shadra
QuestData.Description: We've one last part to collect, and then we'll have everything we need.$B$BThe Shell of Shadra is held by the spider god's last living high priestess, Qiaga the Keeper. She stands atop the Altar of Zul, guarded by other fanatical zealots.$B$BSimple enough, no? Get up the steps of the altar and send her head rolling back down them. Bring the shell to me and we will have Shadra at last.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Qiaga is a devoted disciple of Shadra. She will not part with the shell easily.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Qiaga the Keeper and collect the Shell of Shadra.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... it's finally time. Shadra will be ours!
